alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 10:23AM CDT until April 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS BEEN EXPANDED NORTHEAST... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEAST NEBRASKA AND FAR SOUTHWEST IOWA... * Affected Area...In Iowa, Pottawattamie, Mills, Montgomery, Fremont and Page. In Nebraska, Sarpy, Seward, Lancaster, Cass, Otoe, Saline, Jefferson, Gage, Johnson, Nemaha, Pawnee and Richardson. * Winds...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 18 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
